description.ko: PRISM-2 코어를 통과하는 빛을 시각적으로 탐구하여, 광학적 분산의 물리적 아름다움과 빛이 고유한 색상들로 분리되는 과정을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of light passing through the PRISM-2 core, demonstrating the physical beauty of optical dispersion and the separation of light into its constituent colors.

prompt: A futuristic PRISM-2 crystalline prism suspended in a dark void, a single sharp beam of white light hitting its surface and exploding into a complex, multi-layered spectrum of colors. Hyper-realistic glass textures, volumetric lighting, caustic light patterns, 8k resolution, cinematic optical refraction.
